2015100.name: Our Life: Beginnings & Always - Derek's Story
2015100.description:
Spend wonderful summer days in the company of Derek Suarez during Steps 2 and 4! This is an optional DLC for the free game Our Life: Beginnings & Always.


  • Unlocks 5 Step 2 Moments: Responsible, Lemonade, Soiree (Derek's Version), Siblings, & Boardwalk
  • Unlocks an entirely new storyline in Step 4
  • Allows you to form a deeper relationship with Derek Suarez (platonic or romantic) and get to know his family
  • Includes new character sprite art, background locations, and CG images
  • Provides even more options for adding custom qualities to your character. Is your protagonist good with kids or is that way too much of a hassle?
  • Unlocks bonus scenes in the other Step 2 Moments and in Step 3 Moments where what happened in these events is referenced and reflected on
  • Increases the overall playtime by multiple hours
